subject: Another Hackable Radio----Sangean DT-200VX
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
I keep trying different radios for the hack, but some are unsuccessful. I did
manage to do it on this particular model, which i think is the first one other
then the shack hacks and frank's hacks. Just another outlet for researchers to get involved.

http://www.keyportparanormal.com/simpleghostboxhack.html

Scroll down the page toward the bottom.

-Steve H.

http://www.amazon.com/Sangean-DT200VX-Portable-Pocket-Size-Radio/dp/B00006HOKR/r\
ef=pd_bbs_sr_1?ie=UTF8&s=electronics&qid=1236380421&sr=8-1
